aws_guardduty_ipset.description: Provides a resource to manage a GuardDuty IPSet

activate.description: Specifies whether GuardDuty is to start using the uploaded IPSet.

detector_id.description: The detector ID of the GuardDuty.

format.description: The format of the file that contains the IPSet. Valid values: `TXT` | `STIX` | `OTX_CSV` | `ALIEN_VAULT` | `PROOF_POINT` | `FIRE_EYE`

location.description: The URI of the file that contains the IPSet.

name.description: The friendly name to identify the IPSet.

id.description: The ID of the GuardDuty IPSet.
